item.title: Visual Representation Basics II

item.title: Unstructured text
item.description:
Required Chapter 1: Tidytext format and Chapter 3: Analyzing word and document frequency: tf-idf in Julia Silge and David Robinson, Tidy Text Mining in RJulia Silge and David Robinson, Text Mining with R (Sebastopol, California: O’Reilly Media, 2017), https://www.tidytextmining.com/. Recommended Chapter 6: Topic modeling in Julia Silge and David Robinson, Tidy Text Mining in RIbid.
Ken Benoit, Kohei Watanabe, and Stefan Müller, “quanteda”quanteda is my favorite R-based text package.

item.title: Statistical Models
item.description: Required Chapter 6: Work with Models in Healy. Chapter 22: Model introduction and Chapter 23: Model basics in Wickham/Grolemund. Recommended Chapter 6: Basic Regression from “ModernDive: An Introduction to Statistical and Data Sciences via R” by Chester Ismay and Albert Y. Kim.This is an outstanding new book – with a free online version – that will be a big complement to the tidyverse in the future.
